mapper.insert: INSERT INTO an_cardcomment ( cardCommentId, cardCommentContent, carCommentReplyId, createTime, updateTime, anonymId, cardId ) VALUES ( #{cardCommentId}, #{cardCommentContent}, #{carCommentReplyId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{anonymId}, #{cardId} )
mapper.select: SELECT cardcomment.`anonymId`, (SELECT anonym.`nickName` FROM an_anonym anonym WHERE anonym.`anonymId` = cardcomment.`anonymId`) AS 'nickName', (SELECT anonym.`headerImg` FROM an_anonym anonym WHERE anonym.`anonymId` = cardcomment.`anonymId`) AS 'headerImg' , (SELECT anonym.`nickName` from an_anonym anonym WHERE anonym.`anonymId` = cardcomment.`carCommentReplyId`) AS 'replyName', cardcomment.`cardCommentContent`, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM an_cardcommentfabulous cardcommentfabulous WHERE cardcommentfabulous.`cardCommentId` = cardcomment.`cardCommentId`) AS 'fabulousNum', (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM an_cardcommentfabulous cardcommentfabulous WHERE cardcommentfabulous.`cardCommentId` = cardcomment.`cardCommentId` AND cardcommentfabulous.`anonymId` = '#{anonymId}') AS 'isFabulous' FROM an_card card INNER JOIN an_cardcomment cardcomment ON card.`cardId` = cardcomment.`cardId` WHERE card.`cardId` = '#{cardId}'
